Package org.cast.cwm.service

Class Summary
CwmService  
EmailService Methods for sending email messages required by the program.
EmailService.EmailMessage A simple container for holding the parts of an Email Message.
EventService Methods for working with Events and related information in the database.
HighlightService Service class used by (future) highlighting controls and display forms.
HighlightService.HighlightType Represents a single color highlighter for the application.
ImageService TODO: Compare for quality with https://cwiki.apache.org/WICKET/uploaddownload.html as it was suggested by Igor
ImageService.ScaledImage  
ImageService.ScaledImageComponent  
ImageService.ScaledImageKey  
ImageService.ScaledImageResource  
ImageService.ScaledImageResourceReference  
ResponseService A Hibernate implementation of the service class used to save/load/modify Response objects.
SiteService  
UserService Database operations on Users and related classes.
UserService.LoginData  
UserSpreadsheetReader Object to read a spreadsheet defining users and create those users in the database.
UserSpreadsheetReader.PotentialUserSave A simple object used by UserService for creating a set of Person objects from an uploaded CSV file.
